Tucson had seen complex strategies before and this one was definitely tryin=
g everyone's logic circuits.  Military strategy was one of his areas of exp=
ertise and it was a good opportunity to exercise his skills as a strategist=
.

" before I evolved into a Prime, I spent quite a few vorns assisting the=
 Autobots in the military strategy department.  And this one here, is very =
much like something I've seen before.  Not by Unicronians but by the Decept=
icons back in the days of the wars on Iacon.  I was only a rookie at the ti=
me but I've always had a knack in this field of study so the officers gave =
me a chance to attempt to crack a very complex case.  It had to do with how=
 they were causing Autobots to vanish on the battlefield.  As everything is=
 now it was back then.  They vanished in various quadrants and when I used =
a holographic map and drew lines that connected those locations, it came up=
 with an epicenter of activity around the drawn lines.  I told the officers=
 I wasn't a hundred percent sure but it was possible that the location was =
the area we were looking for.  They investigated and they found the missing=
 Autobots housed in an abandoned complex on Cybertron.   It was one of Shoc=
kwave's master plans that were intended to remain a mystery but he did not =
count on a not so average Autobot to figure it out.  I was always considere=
d to be a bit strange, and off the beaten path.  But the council kept me on=
 their team all the same.  They said due to my rebel like nature, that I wo=
uld not be chosen as a commander but my skills were a great asset to them. =
 I was content with their decision all the same.  I was comfortable just be=
ing who I was.  So if I'm not a good fit as a Prime, I respect their decisi=
on. "

He returns to robot mode.  He looks to Leo Prime with a strategists =
expression.

" I may be wrong about my theory but I'm curious to see if thi=
s case is similar to the one I decoded back on Cybertron.   And if it is, w=
e could even locate the purpetrator as well."

Perpetually on the move and =
constantly busy. 

On Aug 24, 2011, at 8:00 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclon=

the real Rodimus might be out there along with

Optimus Primal. That's it! That's why they want

EQUAL IN STRENGTH AND INTELLIGENCE! "

We have completed preliminary repairs on Silverbolt." he said without

h in the way of preamble. "It would seem that someone attempted to

t his spark directly from from his spark chamber." LEGACY paused
> meaningf=
ully, "The method used was almost very similar to the one used
> during the=
 last large scale minion attack on the attack when I
> arrived, although mo=
re advanced. And I am getting slight Unicronian
> energy traces from Silver=
bolt's wound."
> 
> SANTON stepped out, "But I believe we have have him sta=
ble. It will
> take time for him to recover." There was a small smile from =
the
> Maximal docotr, "It is fortunate that Bantor did what he did to save
=
> him. Had the extractor remained on SILVERBOLT another fraction of a
> mic=
r-second it would have breached extracted his spark."

ticons back in the days of the wars on Iacon.  I was only a rookie at =

As everything is now it was back then.  They vanished in various quadr=
ants and when I used a holographic map and drew lines that connected those =
locations, it came up with an epicenter of activity around the drawn lines.=
  I told the officers I wasn't a hundred percent sure but it was possi=
ble that the location was the area we were looking for.  They investig=
ated and they found the missing Autobots housed in an abandoned complex on =
Cybertron.   It was one of Shockwave's master plans that were intended=

gure it out.  I was always considered to be a bit strange, and off the=

sp;They said due to my rebel like nature, that I would not be chosen as a c=
ommander but my skills were a great asset to them.  I was content with=

There was a nod from LEO as he paused thoughtfully. "I do not know<br>
whe=
re Primal was lost. We have not heard anything from him in quite<br>
some t=
ime. I have been searching the communication's database but can<br>
find no=
thing."<br>

LEO PRIME stepped over to the console as he continued to r=
un through<br>
it. "From what LEGACY tells me of his alternate future, they=
 never<br>
found Primal either, so I do not know if it will be any differen=
t for<br>
us here, but we need to search for him."<br>
<br>
He looked back =
up at TUSCON, "As for Rodimus, that is a possibility I<br>
have considered =
as well and have been taking steps to find out. So far<br>
I have nothing c=
onclusive. No one has any real scans of it to check<br>
against our compute=
r database, but what we have to Legacy to examine."<br>

his name spoken LEGACY stepped out of the chamber where<br>
repairs weere b=
eing attempted on SILVERBOLT.<br>

rs on Silverbolt." he said without<br>

ld seem that someone attempted to<br>
extract his spark directly from from =
his spark chamber." LEGACY paused<br>
meaningfully, "The method used was al=
most very similar to the one used<br>
during the last large scale minion at=
tack on the attack when I<br>
arrived, although more advanced. And I am get=
ting slight Unicronian<br>
energy traces from Silverbolt's wound."<br>

SANTON stepped out, "But I believe we have have him stable. It will<br>
ta=
ke time for him to recover." There was a small smile from the<br>
Maximal d=
ocotr, "It is fortunate that Bantor did what he did to save<br>
him. Had th=
e extractor remained on SILVERBOLT another fraction of a<br>
micr-second it=
